dc_title_s: Pascaert van't eylandt Ceylon, voordelen Taprobana : by de inwoonders genaemt Sankaun
dc_description_s: Cartographic Details: Scale approximately 1:750,000. Relief shown pictorially. Depths shown by soundings. Oriented with north to the right. Probable atlas plate with central fold line. Not numbered. Includes col. ill. of ships at sea and of figures in title cartouche. Dimensions: 51 x 60 centimeters
